data.title: King Me!!!
data.text: Grew up not far from the Checkerboard and have gone twice since last Thanksgiving to meet childhood friends. Then wait staff are prompt and friendly. Everyone there seems to have a good time. Good DJ. Will be going back.

data.title: Gone down hill
data.text: The Checkerboard used to be a nice neighborhood bar. It was one that wasn't a cookie-cutter, chain establishment.  People that went there were from all social classes and everyone had a good time.  However, after two changes in ownership, the place no longer has that welcome, friendly atmosphere that it used to.  If you enjoy a smoke-filled, loud, rowdy, unfriendly environment, this place is for you.
